entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
